price: 26. En voorwaar, Wij schiepen de mensheid (Adam) van harde klei dat van zachte aarde komt.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walaqad khalaqnā al-insāna min ṣalṣālin min ḥama-in masnūnin
